education.institution: Northwestern University – Kellogg School of Management

work_habits.communication_style: Async‑first, with quick syncs when needed
work_habits.response_time_expectation: Typically replies within 2 hours during working hours; within 24 hours for non‑urgent async messages
work_habits.meeting_preferences: Minimizes meetings; prefers short stand‑ups (15 min) and agenda‑driven sessions; avoids back‑to‑back meetings longer than 2 hours
work_habits.work_environment: Hybrid – 3 days remote, 2 days in the Austin office
work_habits.focus_time_requirements: Blocks 3–4 hours of uninterrupted focus daily (usually mid‑morning)

personality.decision_making_approach: Data‑driven, prefers structured analysis before committing; will consult stakeholders for high‑impact choices
personality.collaboration_style: Strategic partner – contributes ideas early, then lets experts execute; comfortable delegating routine tasks
personality.stress_management_approach: Uses Pomodoro technique and short walks; practices mindfulness meditation 3 times a week
personality.conflict_resolution_style: Collaborative – seeks win‑win solutions, backs positions with data, willing to compromise on implementation details

availability.other_commitments: Weekly 1‑hour virtual meetup for the company’s Data Community of Practice
availability.travel_flexibility: Up to 25 % of time (≈1 week per quarter) for on‑site client workshops or conferences

personal_factors.caregiving_responsibilities: Primary caregiver for child; occasional school‑pick‑up responsibilities
personal_factors.commute_situation: No daily commute on remote days; 25‑minute drive on office days
personal_factors.health_considerations: Mild lower‑back soreness; does daily stretching and ergonomic workstation setup
personal_factors.career_motivation: Aiming to become a Lead BI Engineer / Architecture owner; motivated by building scalable data products that directly impact revenue

collaboration.meeting_frequency_preference: Weekly 30‑min team sync, ad‑hoc 15‑min stakeholder check‑ins, quarterly cross‑functional review
collaboration.feedback_style: Direct but diplomatic – provides data‑backed observations and actionable suggestions
collaboration.knowledge_sharing_habits: Maintains a shared 'BI Patterns' Confluence space; writes post‑mortems for major releases; runs monthly brown‑bag sessions on new modeling techniques

potential_bottlenecks: Heavy reliance on a single legacy data source for finance reporting
Limited bandwidth during peak sprint weeks leading to delayed code reviews
risk_factors.backup_person_needed: Emily Chen (Senior Data Engineer, familiar with Thomas’s dbt models)
burnout_risk_factors: Occasional over‑commitment to simultaneous ad‑hoc analysis requests
Back‑to‑back release cycles without buffer weeks
